detailed_goals: Define initial data quality metrics for EHR data related to influenza tracking.
Set weekly targets for improvement of the data quality of the EHR.
Review EHR system capabilities for influenza data collection.
Communicate requirements to the EHR vendor.
Discuss system modifications with vendor.
Update the nursing assessment workflow to include a standardized assessment for influenza symptoms.
Modify the physician examination workflow to include prompts for influenza diagnosis and testing.
Assist in the definition of initial data quality metrics for influenza-related data.
Collaborate with database administrator to incorporate data quality checks into the database schema.
Begin patient assessment and accurate data entry into the EHR.
Administer influenza vaccinations and document the information into the EHR.
Develop detailed requirements specifications for the necessary EHR system updates or modifications.
Consult with the EHR vendor to discuss the feasibility of implementing the required updates or modifications.
Develop and distribute initial communication materials (e.g., project overview, FAQs).
Continue to support timeline for completing the abstraction of historical influenza data.
Continue with table design for the influenza database schema.
Define data types for each column to ensure data integrity.
Define initial data quality metrics for EHR data related to influenza tracking.
Set weekly targets for improvement of the data quality of the EHR.
Develop comprehensive training materials, including slide presentations and user manuals.
